department: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
short_summary: This project involves the remediation of a former military base located approximately 10 km northwest of the Hamlet of Coral Harbour, Nunavut, Canada. It includes the provision of equipment and materials, mobilization, demobilization and logistics, provision of a camp and construction facilities, collection and segregation of debris, remediation of buried debris, demolition of structures and fuel storage tanks, removal of fuel storage tanks from service, hazardous material/debris management and disposal, non-hazardous landfill construction, operation and closure, contaminated soil excavation and disposal or treatment, and final disposal of all materials. The procurement is limited to Inuit firms registered on the IFR. The contract value is estimated at CND 12,491,180.40. The contract duration is scheduled for 258 days, beginning on 10 Feb 2023, and will end on 14 Oct 2023. The proposal submission deadline is 10 Jan 2023.
